title: DSA Level 6 — Recursion & Backtracking
concept: Recursion techniques: permutations, subsets, n-Queens, Sudoku, backtracking search.

challenges.title: Fibonacci (Memoization)
challenges.description: Print the nth Fibonacci number using recursion with memoization.

challenges.title: Generate Subsets
challenges.description: Given an array of integers, generate all subsets (power set) in lexicographic order.
challenges.outputDescription: Print each subset on a new line.

challenges.title: Generate Permutations
challenges.description: Given an array of distinct integers, print all permutations in lexicographic order.
challenges.outputDescription: Each permutation on a new line.

challenges.title: N-Queens
challenges.description: Place N queens on an NxN chessboard. Print total number of valid arrangements.

challenges.title: Rat in a Maze
challenges.description: Given an N×N maze of 0s and 1s, count the paths from (0,0) to (N-1,N-1) moving only right or down.
challenges.constraints: All paths must stay inside maze and only go through 1s.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: number of possible paths.

challenges.title: Sudoku Solver
challenges.description: Fill a 9×9 grid so each row/column/subgrid has digits 1–9 exactly once.

challenges.title: Word Search Grid
challenges.description: Given a grid of letters and a target word, return YES if the word exists by moving adjacent cells (cannot reuse the same cell twice).

challenges.title: Print All Balanced Parentheses
challenges.description: Given N, print all valid combinations of N pairs of parentheses.

challenges.title: Knight’s Tour
challenges.description: Count possible knight’s tours in an NxN chessboard starting from (0,0).
